channel.title: Any Suggestions?
channel.description:
Hey guys, im about to code my v2 but im thinking about using a different source and client. i would like it to have relativly clean files.
what i mean by relativly clean is no unnecesary files. [size=10pt][b]Client[/b][/size] .gz models no unnecesary codes in class8 [b][size=10pt]Server[/size][/b] No Useless Commands clean teleports etc.
If you have any suggestions please post here. thanks

item.title: Any Suggestions?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Yz85racer; check the stickied topic in the download section.

Read full topic

item.title: Any Suggestions?
item.dc:creator: @xpatx xpatx
item.description:
@xpatx wrote:

Or create your own framework. An example is using NIO (nonblocking I/O) but use it so it is ran correctly, because many ‘NIO servers’ use NIO wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Any Suggestions?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“EatU4Dinner, post:1, topic:269295”]Hey guys, im about to code my v2 but im thinking about using a different source and client. i would like it to have relativly clean files.

what i mean by relativly clean is no unnecesary files.
[size=10pt]Client[/size]
.gz models
no unnecesary codes in class8
[size=10pt]Server[/size]
No Useless Commands
clean teleports
etc.

If you have any suggestions please post here. thanks[/quote]

Yz’s base (Your going to need an IDE.)
RS2D (Your going to need an IDE.)
Richscape (Lots of work with this one. Fixing crashes, glitches, etc, but it pays off.)
Kihomaru’s cleaned czar (Loads and loads of work to get this thing operating efficiently.)

Just look for something clean. There are lots of clean bases out there, but it dose not mean they have the stability features you want. If you pick the wrong base you might find yourself rewriting it.

Read full topic
